hero.title: Apply for Your UK ETA
hero.subtitle: Electronic Travel Authorization
hero.description: Fast, secure, and hassle-free UK ETA application service. Get your authorization in as little as 72 hours.

notice.title: Important Notice:
notice.text: This is an independent third-party service and is not affiliated with the UK Government or UKVI.

trust.notice: This service is provided by an independent third-party and is not affiliated with the UK government.

steps.title: Simple 4-Step Process
steps.subtitle: Complete your UK ETA application in just a few minutes with our guided process.

step1.title: Fill Application
step1.description: Complete the secure online form with your personal and travel details.

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Upload your passport and photo securely to our encrypted platform.

step3.title: Make Payment
step3.description: Secure payment processing with multiple payment options available.

step4.title: Receive ETA
step4.description: Get your approved ETA delivered directly to your email inbox.

applicationSteps.title: Simple 4-Step Process
applicationSteps.subtitle: Our streamlined application process makes getting your UK ETA quick and easy

step1.title: Complete Application
step1.description: Fill out the secure online form with your personal details and travel information.

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Submit your passport copy and photo. Our system validates all requirements automatically.

step3.title: Secure Payment
step3.description: Pay securely with credit card, debit card, or PayPal. All transactions are encrypted.

step4.title: Receive Authorization
step4.description: Get your UK ETA via email within 72 hours. Track your application status online.

footer.disclaimer: This website is operated by an independent third-party and is not affiliated with the UK Government or UK Visas and Immigration (UKVI).

brand.title: UK ETA Application
brand.subtitle: Third-party service provider
brand.description: Professional UK ETA application assistance with expert support and secure processing.

footer.copyright: © 2024 UK ETA Application Service. All rights reserved.

passport.title: Passport Information Page
passport.description: Upload a clear photo of your passport's information page
passport.requirements: JPEG, PNG or PDF • Max 10MB • Clear and readable
passport.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here

photo.title: Personal Photo
photo.description: Upload a recent passport-style photo of yourself
photo.requirements: JPEG or PNG • Max 5MB • Passport style photo
photo.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here

payment.title: Payment Details
payment.subtitle: Complete your payment to submit your application
payment.securePayment: Your payment information is secure and encrypted

confirmation.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
confirmation.subtitle: Your UK ETA application has been received and is being processed

step1.title: Email Confirmation
step1.description: You will receive a confirmation email with your reference number

step2.title: Processing
step2.description: We will review your application and documents

step3.title: ETA Delivery
step3.description: Your approved ETA will be sent to your email address

track.title: Track Your Application
track.subtitle: Enter your reference number to check the status of your UK ETA application
track.emailNotifications: You will receive email notifications at each stage of processing
